testsuite.name: Script.RoomContextMenu_CopyPaste

testcase.name: Login
testcase.system-out: Log into EWA Enter valid username into username text box Enter valid password into password text box Select a Room Click on Login button Session for user is already active.Do you want to create new session? dialog box displayed User click on OK button, User logged in successfully... User logged in successfully...

testcase.name: RoomContextMenu_CopyAndPasteDrawerLevel
testcase.system-out: Scenario 02: Verify RoomContextMenu tab - (copy and paste drawer) Log into as admin user Expand the cabinet Select a drawer Mousehover on Roomcontextmenu tab Click on copy option Expand another cabinet Select another drawer Mousehover on Roomcontextmenu tab Paste option should be enable,Click on paste Option Paste confirm dialog should be open,Click on paste confirm dialog OK button Copy and a paste drawer successfully...

testsuite.system-out: Chrome driver launched successfull Chrome Browser launched Successfully... EWA URL launched successfull Contentverse URL launched successfully...
